text:
#Chloroquine & #COVID19

RCT (non placebo) of high vs low dose CQ

high dose (600mg 2x/d for 10d, total dose 12g)

low dose (450mg x5d, 2x daily on first day, total dose 2.7g)

High dose- more QTc>500ms (25%), trend toward higher lethality (17%)

https://t.co/DLvVoLos8d https://t.co/kfDsK2Lk6w
